snippet: The company named Samuel J. Palmisano, former I.B.M. chief, to review its practices after complaints that Bloomberg reporters were snooping in data terminals.
abstract: Bloomberg LP appoints Samuel J Palmisano, former chairman and chief executive of IBM, to review its privacy and data standards; appointment is part of continuing efforts to address concerns that reports at its news division looked at terminal subscribers' data.
lead_paragraph: The company named Samuel J. Palmisano, former I.B.M. chief, to review its practices after complaints that Bloomberg reporters were snooping in data terminals.

headline.seo: Former I.B.M. Chief, Palmisano, to Lead Bloomberg Privacy Review
headline.main: Former I.B.M. Chief to Lead Bloomberg Privacy Review
headline.print_headline: Former I.B.M. Chief to Lead Bloomberg Privacy Review
